casebody.data:
PLOTT
v.
BOJANGLE'S, et al. No. 55A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 28, 2007. Jolinda J. Babcock, Winston-Salem, Eleasa H. Allen, for Bojangle's, et al. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of March 2007 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief: "Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Plott) shall have up to and including the 27th day of May 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 28th day of March 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
